regulatory.title: Regulatory Information
regulatory.company: Quickfund OÜ is a credit company registered in Estonia, duly authorized by the Finantsinspektsioon (Estonian Financial Supervisory Authority) to operate as a lender.
regulatory.passport: Thanks to the 'European passport', we are able to offer our credit solutions to clients located in the EU, in strict compliance with applicable regulations.
regulatory.availability: Offer available only to residents of Estonia. Although our license allows us to receive loan applications from other EU countries, a contract can only be established if the application complies with all applicable consumer credit regulations.
regulatory.refusal: An application may be rejected if it does not meet legal requirements — this refusal simply reflects non-compliance with consumer protection standards.
regulatory.compliance: We fully comply with consumer protection codes, European directives (Directive 2008/48/EC), and GDPR.
regulatory.fraud: In case of attempted fraud, Quickfund OÜ reserves the right to report the facts to the competent authorities.

cookies.message: We use cookies to improve your experience.

languageNotice.detected: Language detected based on your location
languageNotice.terms: Displayed terms and rates apply to residents of this country.
languageNotice.change: You can change country at any time.

footer.title: Let's talk
footer.description: A question? A project? Our team responds within 24 hours.
